price: 28. Ma og tahay kuwa ku beddelay Nicmadda Alle (Islaamka) abaal dhac (gaalnimo)11, oo ka yeelay dadkoodii inay degaan daar halaag.
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفۡرٗا وَأَحَلُّواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡبَوَارِ
footnotes: 11. Waxay ku qaabileen nicmooyinkii Alle beenin halkii xamdi naqa iyo shukrinta.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna baddalū niʿ'mata al-lahi kuf'ran wa-aḥallū qawmahum dāra al-bawāri
